item.title: 生成量子曲线的代码
item.description: c[0, 0, p_, q_] := 1; c[m_, k_, p_, q_] := If[ (k == 0 && m > 0) || k > m, 0, c[m - 1, k, p, q] (Quotient[k p, q] - m + 1 + k) c[m - 1, k - 1, p, q]]; A[p_, q_] := x^q + Sum[ Inverse[Table[Table[c[m, k, p, q], {k, 1, q}], {m, 1, q}]][[q]][[m]] h^(q - m) y^(m - q )
